dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to enter my domain, puny creature? What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, looking for answers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Hah! Your kind is not welcome here. Depart or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, no need for violence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Begone from my sight, coward.
Do not return, lest you wish to face a wrath you cannot comprehend.
Remember it well, for it may save your insignificant life one day.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave, answer me or face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such defiance! Very well, you shall suffer the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared for whatever you may unleash.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the full fury of the Stitchfrost, and may your existence wither away.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you one last chance to stand down.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stand down? Ridiculous! Prepare to be crushed beneath my icy fist!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and I will take it by force if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power, you say? Bold words from a frail being. Let's see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will conquer you and claim your strength for myself!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conquer me? Delusional fool! Prepare to be shattered into pieces.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down, prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let the clash of wills begin!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that this was a mistake, I will retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat? Too late for regrets. I shall show you the folly of your actions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize, I misspoke. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words alone cannot undo your intentions. Prepare to face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand now, I will depart immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Leave, and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until I get what I came for!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn to the end. Very well, face the wrath of the Stitchfrost!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a friend, seeking companionship in this desolate place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Friend? In this place of ice and malice? You are either naive or a fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek understanding and offer my friendship.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? Friendship? Such foreign concepts to me. Be gone, before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my leave, no need for hostility.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hostility? You have no idea what true hostility is. Leave before you find out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be pushed away, I demand explanation!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand all you want, it changes nothing. Prepare for a bitter end!
